title: Fellow typophile Alessandro Segalini has a new font out on myfonts: Hemingway
content:
Fellow typophile Alessandro Segalini has a new font out on myfonts: Hemingway

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/hemingway/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516001416/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/hemingway/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/hemingway/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516001416im_/http:/typophile.com/files/32966_6318.png)
author: ebensorkin

comments.content:
Thank you, Eben !  
It is out at Ascender as well:  
 [http://www.ascenderfonts.com/font/hemingway-pro-1-family.aspx](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516001416/http:/www.ascenderfonts.com/font/hemingway-pro-1-family.aspx "http://www.ascenderfonts.com/font/hemingway-pro-1-family.aspx")
